#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{sell_out_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{now_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{now_manage_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_manage_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{add_depre_month,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,

)

INSERT INTO ASS_SELL_OUT_SOURCE_General ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , sell_out_no , ass_card_no , source_id , price , now_depre , now_manage_depre , add_depre , add_manage_depre , add_depre_month , cur_money , fore_money , note
) select t.* from(
select #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.sell_out_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.price}, 0 price,
#{item.now_depre}, 0 now_depre,
#{item.now_manage_depre}, 0 now_manage_depre,
#{item.add_depre}, 0 add_depre,
#{item.add_manage_depre}, 0 add_manage_depre,
#{item.add_depre_month}, null add_depre_month,
#{item.cur_money}, 0 cur_money,
#{item.fore_money}, 0 fore_money,
#{item.note} null note
from dual
)t
mapper.select:
SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, sell_out_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, add_depre_month, cur_money, fore_money, note FROM ass_sell_out_source_General
AND group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, sell_out_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, add_depre_month, cur_money, fore_money, note FROM ass_sell_out_source_General WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sell_out_no = #{sell_out_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and source_id = #{source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
